reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, comfortable, and soft, with good quality and fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Very good quality and good cut. Falls nicely and looks great. True to size. Read more
items.author: Shelly Long

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: It’s so hard to find a quality crocheted sweater. This one is so beautiful and looks just like the picture. Read more
items.author: Lori Whitfield

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater - Would love to purchase another
items.body: Good quality, wears comfortably if you're active or lounging about. If you're wanting a snug fit, then you may want to size down but if you prefer a looser fit (which I 100% do) no change necessary. Read more
items.author: Thalia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater for summer too
items.body: The size runs big in my opinion. I ordered Large and it's a bit extra roomy. I will keep the size this time since the sweater has the "lace" pattern and I plan to use at least a cami underneath it during summer. For winter I will add something warmer underneath. It might shrink in the first wash too. If you look at the pictures you will see that it has a v-neck in the back too. This might be why it felt so "big". I love the vibrant color. If I decide to buy another one I would probably order the Medium. Read more
items.author: Kat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost PERFECT
items.body: I love these sweaters. Purchased a large which I’m 5’” 8” and they come down to the hip but can be hiked up. You can do a front tuck or you can layer. I’ve got some cute jackets to use for that purpose. The crochet is beautiful and the coverage is great although a tank or bralette is a must. The material is a mid weight, soft and forgiving. Love these sweaters. I’ve been opting for mediums but they seem to run a bit small so purchased a large. Weigh 148 for reference purposes. I love when people list height and weight, gives me a better idea of what sizing to purchase. I purchased black and beige. The beige is almost an apricot to be honest and my one nit pick is there’s a point on each sleeve, same spot that sticks out a bit where they joined the material in the arms. Still a 5 star review. These are great open knit sweaters. Love them! I don’t often leave reviews. Time consuming but these were worth it. They’re a bit oversized depending on which size you choose. I’m sure I could have worn a medium but with my height length would not have made it. I like them a bit oversized so works for me. No regrets because I often return a lot of junky stuff. These are stand outs. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice weight
items.body: I like this sweater however the color wasn’t what I was expecting. I ordered the apricot color. Nice weight and the V in the back of the sweater looks great. Read more
items.author: MMM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I kept this sweater against my better judgment and should not have. I think I’m a little heavy to wear so much texture. That’s my fault though. It is well made and heavy thread and cotton and that’s a huge plus. It is quite open so needs a cami. I think on a smaller and younger woman it would be great! Read more
items.author: Jo Foster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Just like shown, nice quality and true to size Read more
items.author: Vicki Nardolillo

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red, Sky Blue, Gray, Pickle Green, Pink, White, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
